required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of GQ1001 in Adult Patients With HER2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, First-In-Human, Multicenter, Open-Label, Study of GQ1001, a HER2 Targeted Antibody-Drug Conjugate, Administered Intravenously, in Adult Patients With HER2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: Phase I Dose Finding Study for GQ1001 in Patients with HER2-Positive Advanced Solid Tumors

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) and/or Dose Limiting Toxicities (DLTs).
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events will be assessed using NCI CTCAE version 5.0 and will be evaluated by the investigator and the sponsor for the eligibility of DLT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and Severity of Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days) and up to 30 days from treatment discontinuation

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Abnormal Laboratory Values
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days) and up to 30 days from treatment discontinuation

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) of GQ1001
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)
Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time at which the Cmax is Observed (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)
Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)
Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)
Cycle 1 through Cycle 8 (each cycle is 21 days)

secondary_outcome.measure: Preliminary Efficacy of GQ1001 Evaluated using Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST 1.1) and CT of MRI scans
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average 24 weeks

arm_group.description: 1.2 mg/kg GQ1001 administered intravenously. Patients are dosed on a 21 day treatment cycle until disease progression occurs, unacceptable toxicity occurs, or if they voluntarily withdraw their consent.

2.4 mg/kg GQ1001 administered intravenously. Patients are dosed on a 21 day treatment cycle until disease progression occurs, unacceptable toxicity occurs, or if they voluntarily withdraw their consent.

3.6 mg/kg GQ1001 administered intravenously. Patients are dosed on a 21 day treatment cycle until disease progression occurs, unacceptable toxicity occurs, or if they voluntarily withdraw their consent.

4.8 mg/kg GQ1001 administered intravenously. Patients are dosed on a 21 day treatment cycle until disease progression occurs, unacceptable toxicity occurs, or if they voluntarily withdraw their consent.

6.0 mg/kg GQ1001 administered intravenously. Patients are dosed on a 21 day treatment cycle until disease progression occurs, unacceptable toxicity occurs, or if they voluntarily withdraw their consent.
